answers.answer: I went through that exactly. I had my son 4 yrs ago at 35weeks by emergency c section due to preeclampsia. I had problems from the very first week we found out i was pregnant. It was an extremely rough pregnancy. I didn't enjoy it. I counted the weeks not to my due date but to a week where he could be born and actually survive. After i had him i was really down. The delivery and him coming early and staying in the nicu. But once he was a couple weeks old i started to miss being pregnant. Bad. We decided to try for another baby once my son hit 4months. But i couldn't get pregnant. That made me feel even worse. The docs said i was infertile cuz of all my reproductive problems. I got really depressed since i didn't even enjoy my first pregnancy. It took 3.5yrs to get pregnant again. Im now 26weeks with my daughter and even though this pregnancy is kicking my butt like my sons Im enjoying every min of it since my husband and i decided this will be the last.I wish i had some advice to give you. But i unfortunately never got over the dumps until i got pregnant again.

Talk to your dr or a nurse, it could just be hormones it could also be the baby blues or PND. It won't hurt to check it out and talk to someone. If it is PND it's better to catch it earlier than just trying to ride it out.Good luck and I hope things look brighter for you soon.

Thanks for reply. Its so good to know im not crazy and other people hav felt the exact same  i cant explain why i feel this way. I feel silly bursting out cryin non stop. I never thought this would happen me. Id love to b pregnant again. She is only born lol! Even though i feel lack of sleep is a big factor in the teary days!

Thanks for reply. Its so good to know im not crazy and other people hav felt the exact same  i cant explain why i feel this way. I feel silly bursting out cryin non stop. I never thought this would happen me. Id love to b pregnant again. She is only born lol! Even though i feel lack of sleep is a big factor in the teary days!

question: So our lil girl miss Jenna- Rae is here safe and sound after my difficult pregnancy. She is 3wks today! She arrived a week early as dr induced me as she felt baby needed out. Ended up with v v traumatic birth which ended in emergency section.BUT this sounds crazyyyy and i need advice. I am sooo down in the dumps. I miss being pregnant so much. Lik it makes me cry how much I miss it. Even though i had a tough time etc i still miss goin to my apps preparing for baby and all that gkes with it. :(  Even though the last few weeks all i wanted was baby out. Also I sorta miss our life while i was preg jst me and OH chatting amd talking about the future. But now shes here and is so perfect i cant shake this feeling. Anyone feel similar after having baby? Sorry to rant on i just need some support right now xxx
title: she is here!!!!!
